itemDisplayName: Deploy a Low-Priority VM Scale Set with Python Bottle server & AutoScale
description: Deploy a low-priority VM Scale Set with eviction policy set to delete behind a load balancer/NAT & each VM running a simple Python Bottle app that does work. With Autoscale configured Scale Set will scale out & in as needed
summary: Deploys a low-priority VM Scale Set of Linux VMs behind a load balancer with NAT rules for ssh connections. Each VM runs a Python Bottle application that can trigger Auto scaling activity based on defined rules
